text: @realDonaldTrump If you help subsidies Tesla and their goal to put out self driving Semi's, you wouldn't have to to truck drivers at risk of contracting a Coronavirus. Does this actually show how much you respect Truck drivers? And subsidies new training for new jobs. All this over your head.
